backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing the Poop Tracker backend with user registration, poop entry logging, profile retrieval, ranked user stats, and daily statistics calculations stored in a principal-keyed map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: a tri-state profile detection rewrite in App.tsx and a guarded useProfile hook rewrite in useQueries.ts, both preventing premature 'no profile' routing during actor initialization.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON map of frontend source file paths to short human-readable summaries describing each file's role and notable implementation details in the Poop Tracker app.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file importing Tailwind directives and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the app's light and dark color themes including sidebar, chart, and semantic UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Poop Tracker Vite/React app, mounting the React root and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component implementing tri-state profile detection ('loading'/'has-profile'/'no-profile') using TanStack Router and React Query, deferring all routing until identity, actor, and profile query are fully resolved.
frontend/src/components/AllTimeStandings: Displays a sortable all-time leaderboard table with per-user stats (poops, wipes, TP rolls, avg wipes) and badges for King Pooper, King Wiper, and The Efficient Wiper roles.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell layout component providing a sticky header with navigation and logout button, a main content area, and a footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays a lifetime leaderboard card with three award categories (King Pooper, King Wiper, Efficient Wiper) derived from ranked user stats, including an MVP badge when one user holds both top titles.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardToggl: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePreview.t: Renders a user profile avatar (emoji on a colored/gradient background) with an optional display name, supporting three size variants.
frontend/src/constants/profileOptions.ts: Exports three constant arrays of selectable profile customization options: emojis, hex color values, and CSS gradient background strings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) via React Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data: user profile, profile registration, poop entry creation, and ranked user stats.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines light/dark mode CSS custom properties for the app's design token system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing a welcome card with the user's profile, a quick poop-log button, the Leaderboard component, AllTimeStandings, and an informational about card.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that displays a branded card with an Internet Identity login button, using the useInternetIdentity hook to handle authentication.
frontend/src/pages/LogPoop.tsx: Multi-step page component for logging a poop entry, guiding the user through confirmation, wipe count input, and a success screen, then submitting via a mutation to the backend actor.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation page allowing users to set a display name and choose an emoji, color, and background, with a live preview and a mutation to register the profile via the backend actor.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via oklch variables, fonts, border radii, animations) and enabling the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the current version, feature list, architectural notes, and known issues for the poop tracker app.
